summary.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

span.span: Occurs when the collection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合變更的範例包括新增或移除資料行。Examples of collection changes include additions or removals of columns. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridViewColumnCollection1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumnCollection1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#372)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#372](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#372)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn GetFirstColumn(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates includeFilter) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstColumn (includeFilter As DataGridViewElementStates) As DataGridViewColumn

param.name: includeFilter
param.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

span.span: A bitwise combination of the values that represents the filter for inclusion.

summary.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在顯示順序中的第一個資料行是使用最低的資料行值，而不論是否在畫面上看到的實際資料行。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 這個方法可讓您判斷符合指定的準則，而不必直接比較的索引值的第一個資料行。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用交換的第一個顯示的資料行和最後一個顯示的資料行的方法。The following code example uses the method to swap the first displayed column and the last displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

exception.span: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

span.span: is not a valid bitwise combination of values.

span.span: Returns the first column in display order that meets the given inclusion-filter and exclusion-filter requirements.

returns.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The first column in display order that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在顯示順序中的第一個資料行是使用最低的資料行值，而不論是否在畫面上看到的實際資料行。The first column in display order is the column with the lowest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 這個方法可讓您判斷符合指定的準則，而不必直接比較的索引值的第一個資料行。This method lets you determine the first column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在顯示順序中的最後一個資料行是具有最高的資料行值，而不論是否在畫面上看到的實際資料行。The last column in display order is the column with the highest value, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 這個方法可讓您判斷符合指定的準則，而不必直接比較的索引值的最後一個資料行。This method lets you determine the last column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用交換最後一個顯示的資料行和第一個顯示的資料行的方法。The following code example uses the method to swap the last displayed column and the first displayed column. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

summary.span: Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

span.span: Gets the first column after the given column in display order that meets the given filter requirements.

returns.span: The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

span.span: The next column that meets the given filter requirements, or if no column is found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在顯示順序中的下一個資料行是使用最低的資料行值高於所指定的資料行，而不論是否在畫面上看到的實際資料行的值。The next column in display order is the column with the lowest value higher than the value of the specified column, regardless of whether the column is actually visible on the screen. 這個方法可讓您判斷在目前符合指定的準則，而不必直接比較的索引值的資料行之後的下一個資料行。This method lets you determine the next column after the current column that fits the given criteria without having to compare index values directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 當覆寫衍生類別時，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，讓已註冊的委派收到事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
